mapper.sql: id, parent_id, layers, system_code, type, code, name, icon, url, sort_num, remark, create_by, create_time, modify_by, modify_time
mapper.select: select m.id, m.parent_id, m.layers, m.system_code, m.type, case when m.type=3 then concat(mf.code,'-',m.code) else m.code end as code, m.name, m.icon, m.url, m.sort_num from Sys_Menu m left join Sys_Menu mf on m.parent_id = mf.id and mf.type=2 inner join Sys_RoleMenu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id inner join Sys_Role r on r.id = rm.role_id inner join Sys_UserRole ur on r.id = ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and m.system_code = #{systemCode} order by m.sort_num ASC
